replyMessage:
I'm sorry :cry: I didn't get it! Please try to write it again 
To start over try saying 'Hello', 'Hi' or 'Menu'
I'm sorry :cry:, try choosing one of the available options.
*_Hi <@USER>, I'm Peach :peach:, nice to meet you!_*
*_Tell me how can I help? (In case you don't know just type 'Menu'_*)

*_This is my Menu :sunglasses:, Tell me what would you like me to help you with?_*
*_Please just write the number of your interest_*:
  
1. Who am I?
2. Certifications
3. Compensation
4. Ethic line
5. Talent Acquisition 
6. FQA 
7. Feedback Peach.
*_Yaaaas :rocket:! Ontop is the best place to work!_*

*_Goodbye - au revoir - arrivederci - auf wiedersehen - tchau - daag - chao _*
*_Have a nice one! :kissing_closed_eyes: _*

*_Who am I? That's one secret :shushing_face: I'll never tell... You know you love me. XOXO, Peach :peach:_* 
*_Just kidding :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:, I'm Peach an important member of HR who is here to help you with a lot of things._*
  
To go back to Menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with, just type 'Bye'.

*_Do you need a certification of - Services rendered request - :page_with_curl: ?_ *
*_A.K.A 'Job Certificate' don't worry I got you, just click on the next link:_* 
  
<https://www.notion.so/ontopai/Certification-of-Services-Rendered-Request-f337ebf1e86f457f9f34821fa8d57479|Click Here> 
  
To go back to Menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with, just type 'Bye'.

*_This is the compensation menu, here you can find a guide on how to request it!_* 
*_Use this info carefully :wink:_* 
  
1. Guideline
2. Form to request it
  
To go back to Menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with, just type 'Bye'.

*_At Ontop we really care about our people :hugging_face:! Take a look at this form that will give you the opportunity to speak when you need it the most (anonymously if you want to), and our VP of HR is there to help you in the process. :hugging_face:_*
  
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScQv2h6HkKD_-QbCGD03ouF5OJwTK71-iUZMys7_Rxsb8EnfA/viewform|Click Here> 
  
To go back to Menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with, just type 'Bye'.

*_This is the Talent Acquisition Menu  :guitar:, here you will find the job descriptions for the different roles we have, and if you are a leader you will be able to find how to request the new talent you need to keep rocking!_* 
  
1. Job descriptions
2. Talent Acquisition Form
  
To go back to Menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with, just type 'Bye'.

*_From my experience as a member of HR :face_with_hand_over_mouth:, these are our most frequent requests. Take a look at them a choose the one you need._*
  
1. Offboarding process step-by-step 
2. How to request a Day-Off ? 
3. Global days Off
4. Ontopers birthdays
5. Perks for being part of Ontop
6. Org Chart 
 
To go back to Menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with, just type 'Bye'.

*_I'm gorgeous I know :kissing_heart:! But I also know feedback is part of our DNA since day one, so is there something you would like to add or change let me know by just filling out the next form:  _* 
  
<https://forms.gle/reWEWAizRcQYd1ug9|Click Here> 
  
To go back to Menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with, just type 'Bye'.

*_As a leader do you want to know how to request a career advancement - request a fee Increase or give a new Role-area to one of your teammates :face_with_monocle:? take a look at how to do it correctly here:_*
  
<https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/11mJKz1poHDxBxUXzw_RRtKBpZl-ZkIeUNpNc-2hfeKc/edit#slide=id.g11aea635790_0_264|Click Here> 
  
To go back to the previous options just type *'9'*  if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_As a leader you may wanna give one of your teammates a fee increase, career advancement, or move them to a new area, to know where to request it :money_mouth_face:, just click on the next link:_*
  
<https://forms.gle/8oeJQ1ZtpjShPhNc6|Click Here> 
  
To go back to the previous options just type *'9'*  if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_There's a Job description for every role if you want to know yours :nerd_face:, just click here: _*
  
 <https://www.notion.so/ontopai/Talent-Acquisition-3d7187cb35734939b8f7c4b6f8e7d3f9#41a5fd708b96478c992dd34989763fbc|Click Here>
  
To go back to the previous options just type *'9'*  if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

*_If you want to request a new rockstar :guitar: whether is a new role or a replacement :wink: just click on the next link:_*

To go back to the previous options just type *'9'*  if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

To go back to the previous options just type *'9'*  if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

To go back to the previous options just type *'9'*  if you want to go back to menu just type 'Menu'
If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.

If there's nothing else I can help you with for the moment just type 'Bye'.
